website_summaries.verdict: One of the best premium 2-in-1 shampoos. Good pick for extra hair care in a single product.
pros: A little goes a long way with this shampoo and conditioner combo
Subtle yet long-lasting scent leaves just the right touch of an aroma on the hair
cons: Burns when comes in contact with the eyes

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, rinses out easily, smells great, another excellent Jack Black product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Jack Black fan. They make useful, high performing products that i really love. This product is both a shampoo and conditioner. Many other shampoos I have tried have both but they do not rinse out well plus they leave an oily residue on my shoulders and back. This shampoo cleans well, conditions my hair so that it has a soft feel without being oily and rinses out better than any 2 in 1 shampoo / conditioner I have tried. Jack Black products are personal favorites - I have a lot and use them all the time. This will be my go-to shampoo as long as I still have hair. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dom Miliano

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but expensive and eye burining
customer_reviews.text: Jack Black makes good products, albeit expensive products, and this shampoo/conditioner is no exception. I like the option of only using one container to both shampoo and condition, but like I said it is expensive and one other thing....it will sting your eyes like nothing you've experienced. I repeat, do not let this get anywhere near your eyes. Sometimes you cannot help getting a little on your face and possibly your eyes, but trust me, do not make that mistake with this product. The eye stinging and expense are really the only negatives with this product. It smells really clean and leaves my hair feeling soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Beauvais

customer_reviews.title: Be consistent.
customer_reviews.text: Its not about scent with this one, it's about the quality of your hair after consistent use, my hair is thick, like Hispanic thic/ really wavy, I've never really had the capability to "style" my hair other then looking like I'm about to go super sayien my whole life because of this, until now. This stuff works, just be consistent, I've tried a few other fancy shmazy ones, just try this one, go through at least the bottle. You'll thank me later when your confidence goes up.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: It got rid of my dandruff. So I'd say it worked miracles. Product makes my hair feel healthier and not greasy or dried out after shower like with other 2-in-1s. Another great jack black product.
customer_reviews.author: MyNameYeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice "Manly" Shampoo for scalp issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo for my husband. He was having scalp/skin issues and I had tried many shampoos. He also is concerned with thinning hair and from all the reviews that I read, this was a fantastic choice. I had also looked into "Monet" and was told it was a scam, so I went with this. He loves it. He likes the smell, all his scalp issues are gone, and he likes that it's "for a man". I tried it one day and I didnt think it was anything special, mainly the smell was "manly" and not my thing. It's also a good shampoo if you color your hair, it doesn't fade out coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Heatherjill47

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of the Jack Black product line. I dig this product with 1 glaring issue. Does not ship with a pump. The first time i bought this at a brick and mortar store, it came with a pump (great for shower, dont have to juggle wet slippery bottles). Ever since, the new bottle come with the squeeze cap and I have to keep re-using my pump cap. Not sure if this is a product limitation currently, or just from Amazon. Either way, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Lather-less
customer_reviews.text: I personally love Jack Black products but my husband was not a fan of this item due to the lack of lather. The ingredients that often create lather are actually harmful to your hair so I see this as a good thing but my husband is someone who needs a visual to know he’s getting the job done. For him the lack of lather makes him feel less clean.
customer_reviews.author: catielady

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend's hair is visibly thicker and softer. He has struggled with his hair thinning for years and now we have finally gotten it under control. The scent is a little weird at first but not in a bad way. More like in a garden kind of way. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Finch

customer_reviews.title: If you want dry, lifeless, brittle hair, then this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is ok. The product has no conditioning quality.it dries my hair more than shampoo. I don’t know if I can return it, but I suspect I’ve lost thirty-two bucks. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: J. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Will
customer_reviews.text: I received this product as promised however, the product did not feel or smell like the original product. After the first use, I had some hair fall and itchiness and noticed that the product packaging was slightly off and the ingredient list didn’t make any sense. On reading the other reviews I realized this was a counterfeit and immediately returned. The best option is to buy directly from jack blacks website.
customer_reviews.author: aman sehgal

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a metro kind of guy. I work in construction, so the guys on site would give me a lot of crap if I came in smelling like anything other than Old Spice. That being said, I get really dandruff and bad dry skin in my beard in the winter. This stuff smells a little like mint and it is the only product I've used that actually resolved my dry skin issues. Topper: my wife really likes how it smells.

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo, cheap pump

product_meta.title: Jack Black - Double-Header Shampoo + Conditioner - PureScience Formula, Coconut Oil and Kelp Extract, Sulfate-Free, Removes Oil and Product Buildup, Lightly Conditions and Soothes, 16 Oz
product_meta.description:
A shampoo and conditioner with a creamy, sulfate-free lather that removes oil and product buildup while lightly conditioning, detangling, and soothing the scalp. Hydrates and conditions to improve the overall healthy appearance of the hair. Creatine fortifies hair to increase strength and shine, while Coconut Oil conditions and detangles. For extra thick or coarse hair, follow with Nourishing Hair & Scalp Conditioner.

BRAND STORY
By Jack Black
